page.title: 20POSTSCRIPT
page.content: The work for this D Block{No.04320384, part of the city of Sheffield,has been compiled by children from the six schools taking part. The following represented their schools when the pages were finally edited: {Carfield Junior:}Susan Bingham, Jonathon Downward, Ryan Keyworth, David Smith.{ {Carterknowle Junior:}Ian Danks, John Dargie, Barnaby Peel, Megan Taylor. {Greystones Middle:}Lucy Atkinson, Julia Blowers, Nicola Schofield.{ {Hunters Bar Middle:}Mark Cabon, Emily Crook, John Wigley.{ {Lowfields Junior:}Marcus Jones,Natalie Khoaz, Katie Lambert,Richard Saunders. {Lydgate Middle:}Ruth Dent, Samuel Hearn, Nalin Jayaratne, Michael Parry.
